text: Maxine Edwyna Cissel Horner (January 17, 1933 â€“ February 7, 2021) was an American politician. She was one of the first African American women to serve in the Oklahoma State Senate. She was a member of the state senate from 1986 to 2004.Darcy, R and Jennifer Paustenbaugh. Oklahoma Women's Almanac, OPSA Press, 2005. Horner died on February 7, 2021, twenty one days after her 88th birthday. ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: Maxine Horner
